name: Uriel’s Chasm 3: Gelshock
description: Fear is eternal. You wake up, the gelatinous, adrenochrome saturated subject of an ancient prophecy, formulated by a brotherhood of abandoned sentient machines; stuck on the cusp of an evolutionary leap.
minimum_requirements: Мінімальні: ОС: Win 10 Процесор: 1.4GHz Оперативна пам’ять: 2 GB ОП Відеокарта: 512 MB of dedicated video memory/ latest directxweb drivers (included)
